review: I was hoping it could have more apps like vudu and really cascino apps.  Games were not that great more like kid little kid games.  its not as good as apple.
author: laura page

review: I installed fire stick.  I am very very disappointed as I lose connection every few mins.  I am reafy to return this.
author: Sharron White

review: Device constantly drops connection. Works great when it works, but rebooting the device to reestablish a connection every few hours is a nuisance.
author: Matt

review: S***ty device. it advertises it works with iphone and android using DIAL to "fling" youtube etc from phone/tablet but it doesn't work. I called technical support and they also could not figure it out and told me that not every phone works and I should contact Samsung to check. That's bizarre. I have Galaxy S5 with android 5.0 and it works perfectly fine with Roku and Chromecast. I think its false advertisement. I would not recommend this product to anyone.
author: viv

review: I love this Fire TV Stick. It is so easy to use.
author: colleenie1971

review: Not what I expected.  No benefit over What I have.
author: Buytwosue

review: most saddened by its complexities in installing after 3 hours trying to operate with my Yamaha Receiver, I gave up. Had professional support with negative results.
author: Andrew J Parlantieri Sr

review: Couldn't connect with my network. Sent it back
author: Jean E. Brown "bargaineer"
